About Senpai Suggests

Senpai Suggests is an anime recommendation platform built by anime enthusiasts for anime enthusiasts. Our mission is to help you discover new shows, manage your watchlist, and dive deeper into the anime world with a personalized experience.

Meet the Team

Member 1

Hi, I'm Member 1. I handle the backend development and make sure the server-side runs smoothly. Iâ€™m passionate about anime and coding!

Member 2

Hey, I'm Member 2. I focus on frontend design and user experience. I love making Senpai Suggests look great and feel intuitive!

Member 3

Hello, I'm Member 3. I work on data and algorithms to provide the best anime recommendations. Anime is my passion, and I love sharing it with others.

); }; export default AboutUs;
